sentence: One feature of this micro-coalition of more dedicated Trump disciples is their ability to help cast out ideological dissenters, such as Republican Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, who was ousted from her House GOP leadership post after repeatedly criticizing Trump for inciting the January 6 insurrection.
author: Jake Lahut
title: How Marjorie Taylor Greene's endorsement of J.D. Vance shows what it takes to make it into the next generation's MAGA clique
